bibl.title: A Second Look at the Poetics of Re-enactment in Ode 13 of Bacchylides.
bibl.note: The original version of this article was a paper presented at the conference 'Space and time in choral poetry' held at Corpus Christi College (Oxford) in June 2008.

bibl.title: Archaic and Classical Choral Song. Performance, Politics and Dissemination

bibl.seg: Gregory Nagy, A Second Look at the Poetics of Re-enactment in Ode 13 of Bacchylides.

Lucia Athanassaki & Ewen Lyall Bowie (edd.), Archaic and Classical Choral Song. Performance, Politics and Dissemination = Trends in Classics. Supplementary Volumes. 10 (Berlin - New York, 2011) pp. 173-206.
The original version of this article was a paper presented at the conference 'Space and time in choral poetry' held at Corpus Christi College (Oxford) in June 2008.
